rows.label: qst560214_msg0001
rows.name:
I was salvaging and found a
special-looking Assist Core, mo.

rows.label: qst560214_msg0002
rows.name:
But Mabumabu isn't a Driver,
so it's useless to me, mo.

rows.label: qst560214_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll give it to you as a
present, so you should
equip it on someone, mo.

rows.label: qst560214_msg0004
rows.name:
I think it would be perfect
for a Blade who's into
brawling lately, mo.

rows.label: qst560214_msg0005
rows.name: How was the Assist Core I gave you, mo?

rows.label: qst560214_msg0006
rows.name:
Did it increase your launch
power when equipped, mo?

rows.label: qst560214_msg0008
rows.name:
...Well, I think it's
something special, so please
take good care of it, mo.
